body_html: Oh I wasn't planning to work on it, just to start progressively requesting more of them in next PRs. If you want to add some of them to get us started, then that would be great! We could make a separate TestCase for them (TestScriptErrors?)

body: Oh I wasn't planning to work on it, just to start progressively requesting more of them in next PRs. If you want to add some of them to get us started, then that would be great! We could make a separate `TestCase` for them (`TestScriptErrors`?)
